name: datawedge-demo
description: Demo app for Capacitor DataWedge Plugin

scripts.build: npm run copy:www && npx cap sync
scripts.build:apk: cd android && ./gradlew assembleDebug && echo 'APK built at: android/app/build/outputs/apk/debug/app-debug.apk'
scripts.run:device: npm run build:apk && npm run install:apk && adb -s 22072523021178 shell am start -n com.datawedge.demo/.MainActivity
